warnings-messages/item-description-begin: Description ({lang}) such as {description} on {example_entity} begins with article "{article}". Descriptions should not normally begin with initial articles ("a", "an", "the"). See the manual for more information.

Description ({lang}) such as {description} on {example_entity} begins with uppercase letter "{uppercase_letter}". Descriptions begin with a lowercase letter except when uppercase would normally be required or expected. See the manual for more information.
warnings-messages/item-description-end-b: Description ({lang}) such as {description} on {example_entity} ends by a punctuation sign "{punctuation_sign}". Description are not sentences, so the punctuation sign at the end should be avoided. See the manual for more information.
warnings-messages/item-description-ident: Both the description ({lang}) and the label ({label_lang}) on {example_entity} are {description}. Description are expected to be more specific than labels. See the manual for more information.
warnings-messages/item-description-too-l: Description ({lang}) such as {description} on {example_entity} is too long. Its length is {length}, which is more than {max_length}. Descriptions are not full sentences, but small bits of information. In most cases, the proper length is between two and twelve words. See the manual for more information.
warnings-messages/early-gregorian-date/b: Dates earlier than October 1582 (such as in year {example_year}) are unlikely to be expressed using the Gregorian calendar. See the manual to specify the appropriate calendar for your dates.
warnings-messages/early-gregorian-date/t: Early dates in the Gregorian calendar
warnings-messages/invalid-entity-type/bo: Uses of {property_entity} on items such as {example_entity} are invalid.
warnings-messages/no-unit-provided/body: Values such as {example_value} on {example_item_entity} are expected to have units.
warnings-messages/invalid-unit/body: Units such as {unit_entity} used on {example_item_entity} are invalid for {property_entity}.
warnings-messages/values-should-be-integ: Values are expected to be integers, but {example_value} added on {example_item_entity} has a fractional part. See the manual to learn how to fix their format.
warnings-messages/bounds-disallowed/body: Values are not expected to have uncertainty bounds, but {example_value} added on {example_item_entity} has some. See the manual to learn how to fix their format.
warnings-messages/forbidden-value/body: Items such as {example_value_entity} added on {example_subject_entity} are not allowed as values for {property_entity}.
warnings-messages/ignored-coordinates/bo: Some coordinates are incorrectly formatted, such as {example_value}. See the allowed formats.
warnings-messages/ignored-amount/body: Some amounts are incorrectly formatted, such as {example_value}. See the allowed formats.
warnings-messages/ignored-date/body: Some dates are incorrectly formatted, such as {example_value}. See the allowed formats.
warnings-messages/ignored-language/body: Some language identifiers are invalid, such as {example_value}. See the allowed values.
warnings-messages/invalid-identifier-spa: Some reconciled cells such as {example_cell} were ignored because they are not reconciled to Wikidata.
Invalid identifier space for reconciled cells.
warnings-messages/non-printable-characte: Strings such as {example_string} contain non-printable characters.
warnings-messages/duplicate-whitespace/b: Strings such as {example_string} contain duplicate whitespace.
warnings-messages/monolingual-text-witho: Some label, description, alias or monolingual text value have been skipped because no language was provided. Example value: {example_text}.
No language provided for monolingual text.
warnings-messages/ignored-references/bod: None of their statements could be parsed, so no reference was added.
warnings-messages/ignored-qualifiers/bod: Qualifier values could not be parsed, so they will not be added to the corresponding statements.
warnings-messages/no-issue-detected/body: Note that OpenRefine cannot detect all the types of problems Wikidata edits can have.
warnings-messages/no-issue-detected/titl: No issue was detected in your edits.
warnings-messages/no-edit-generated/body: There might be something wrong with your schema.
warnings-messages/identical-values-for-d: This property should have distinct values, but the same value was found on {item1_entity} and {item2_entity} for instance.
warnings-messages/single-valued-property: This property is expected to be used at most once on each item but has been added multiple times on the same item, for instance on {example_entity}.
{property_entity} added more than once on the same item.
warnings-messages/disallowed-qualifiers/: Statements using {statement_property_entity} such as the one on {example_item_entity} should not have a {disallowed_property_entity} qualifier as they are incompatible.
warnings-messages/missing-mandatory-qual: Statements using {statement_property_entity} such as the one on {example_item_entity} are missing a mandatory {missing_property_entity} qualifier.
warnings-messages/property-found-in-refe: You are using {property_entity} in a reference but it is not designed for that.
warnings-messages/property-found-in-qual: You are using in {property_entity} as a qualifier but it is not designed for that .
warnings-messages/property-found-in-main: You are using {property_entity} as a main statement but it is not designed for that.
warnings-messages/unsourced-statements/b: Most statements should have references. You can add them easily in the schema.
warnings-messages/self-referential-state: While not forbidden, self-referential statements are generally suspicious. You have some on {example_entity}.
warnings-messages/missing-inverse-statem: Any {added_property_entity} statement such as the one from {source_entity} to {target_entity} should also be added in reverse with {inverse_property_entity}: in this case, {target_entity} {inverse_property_entity} {source_entity}.
warnings-messages/remove-statements-with: If these statements currently exist on Wikidata, this will solve constraint violations.
warnings-messages/add-statements-with-in: Values for this property are expected to match the regular expression {regex}, which is not the case for {example_value} added on {example_item_entity}.
warnings-messages/new-item-without-P31-o: You should provide an "instance of" (P31) or "subclass of" (P279) statement for each item that you create, such as {example_entity}.
New items created without any type.
warnings-messages/new-item-with-deleted-: There is probably something wrong in your schema or project.
warnings-messages/new-item-without-descr: Adding descriptions on new items such as {example_entity} will make it easier to disambiguate the items from namesakes.
New items created without any description.
warnings-messages/new-item-without-label: You should at least provide one label for new items such as {example_entity}, so that others can understand what the item is about.
New items created without any label or alias.
warnings-messages/new-item-created/body: Please make sure that these items do not exist yet and are suitable for inclusion in Wikidata.
warnings-messages/new-item-created/title: This edit batch will create new Wikidata items.
perform-wikidata-edits/edit-summary-plac: a few words to describe your edits
perform-wikidata-edits/review-your-edits: You are about to upload {nb_edits} edits to Wikidata. Please check them carefully. Large edit batches should be submitted for bot review first.
wikidata-account/remember-credentials-la: Remember credentials (stored unencrypted in OpenRefine's preferences)
wikidata-account/explain-log-in: Logging in to Wikidata lets you to upload edits directly from OpenRefine.
wikidata-schema/unsaved-warning: You have made unsaved changes to your Wikidata schema. Close anyway?
wikidata-schema/incomplete-schema-could-: Your schema is incomplete so it cannot be saved yet.
wikidata-schema/discard-schema-changes-a: Discard the changes made to the schema.
wikidata-schema/save-schema-alt: Save the schema to OpenRefine. The changes will not be uploaded to Wikidata yet.
wikidata-schema/unsaved-changes-alt: You have made unsaved changes to your Wikidata schema.
wikidata-schema/invalid-schema-warning-p: Your schema is incomplete, fix it to see the preview.
wikidata-schema/invalid-schema-warning-i: Your schema is incomplete, fix it to see the issues.
wikidata-schema/datatype-not-supported-y: This datatype is not supported yet, sorry.
wikidata-schema/item-or-reconciled-colum: type item or drag reconciled column here
wikidata-schema/empty-terms: no labels, descriptions or aliases added
wikidata-schema/preview-explanation: This tab shows the first edits (out of {nb_edits}) that will be made once you upload the changes to Wikidata. You can use facets to inspect the edits on particular items.
wikidata-schema/dialog-explanation: The Wikidata schema below specifies how your tabular data will be transformed into Wikidata edits. You can drag and drop the column names below in most input boxes: for each row, edits will be generated with the values in these columns.
